entry.title: Money Magnet (Dhan Yog Bracelet)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vama
Type:
Price: 999.00

Money Magnet (Dhan Yog Bracelet)

Crafted with Citrine and Green Aventurine, two renowned crystals for wealth and good fortune, this bracelet is perfect for anyone looking to enhance their prosperity.

Green Jade : Promotes harmony, emotional balance, and attracts good luck.
Green Aventurine: Known as the “Stone of Opportunity,” it brings prosperity and opens doors to financial growth.
Tiger Eye: Enhances courage, confidence, and decision-making power—great for career success.
Citrine : Attracts wealth, abundance, and positive energy—often called the “Merchant's Stone.”
Sphatik (Quartz Crystal): Provides mental clarity, peace, and spiritual protection—ideal for meditation and focus.
Pyrite: Acts as a shield against negativity and attracts wealth and business success.

Designed for both men and women, this adjustable bracelet blends elegance with the power of manifestation. Wear it daily and invite abundance into your life!

Benefits:

Brings Financial Growth – Enhances wealth-attracting energy and supports financial success.

Improves Career & Business Luck – Opens doors to new opportunities and prosperity in work and business.

Boosts Confidence & Decisions – Strengthens self-assurance and clarity for better financial choices.

Aligns with Lakshmi Energy – Connects with the goddess of wealth to invite abundance and good fortune.

entry.title: Love and Money Attraction Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vama
Type:
Price: 1299.00

Also known as: Love and Wealth Bracelet, Rose Quartz and Pyrite Bracelet, Attract Love and Money Bracelet, Crystal Healing Bracelet for Love and Success, It Attract both love and prosperity in your life with this special bracelet made from two powerful natural stones – Rose Quartz and Pyrite.

Rose Quartz - Known as the stone of love, it boosts self-love, emotional healing, and helps attract true, meaningful relationships.

Pyrite - A strong money attraction crystal that brings wealth, success, and supports a positive mindset.

Benefits of Wearing:

  • Helps attract true love (Find True Love Bracelet)

  • Brings wealth and financial success (Attract Wealth Crystal Bracelet)

  • Improves relationships and reduces conflicts (Relationship Healing Crystal)

  • Boosts confidence and supports goal manifestation (Confidence Booster Crystal)

How to Wear:

  • Wear the bracelet on a Friday or Monday morning, after taking a bath, with a calm and focused mind.

  • Before wearing, you may cleanse it with holy water (Ganga Jal) or raw milk for extra purity.

  • (Best Day to Wear Crystal Bracelet, How to Energize Crystal Bracelet)

Usage:

  • Suitable for daily wear.

  • You can also gift it to your loved ones for emotional and financial positivity.

  • (Gift for Love & Success, Daily Wear Crystal Bracelet)

Note:

Genuine Rose Quartz may turn light pink or whitish if kept in direct sunlight for a long time. This is a normal and natural process.

(Real Rose Quartz Color Change)

2. Enhances strength and stamina, empowering you to overcome challenges.

3. Encourages courage, reducing fear and fostering resilience.

6. Healing properties that alleviate anxiety, improving overall health.
